channel.title: A study of the #mopar IRC badwords filter
channel.description:
Just an IRC log.
[code]* Tr3v0r has joined #mopar <Sepictic> Tr3v0r <Sepictic> Tr3v0r <Sepictic> Tr3v0r <Tr3v0r> wut. <Sepictic> say my name <Sepictic> wanna test something <Tr3v0r> sepictic * Tr3v0r was kicked by Nintendo (Watch your language!) * Tr3v0r has joined #mopar <Tr3v0r> owtf <Sepictic> it didn't work, try again <Tr3v0r> it kicked me <Sepictic> it might be your client <Tr3v0r> sepictic * Tr3v0r was kicked by Nintendo (Watch your language!) * Tr3v0r has joined #mopar <Sepictic> hmm, that's odd <Sepictic> i think i fixed it, say my name again <Tr3v0r> erm. <Tr3v0r> last time. <Sepictic> one last time <Sepictic> ok <Tr3v0r> sepictic * Nintendo sets mode: +b *!*@daIRC-DA9F5549.tampfl.fios.verizon.net * Tr3v0r was kicked by Nintendo (Watch your language!) <Sepictic> and the kick... and it's good! <Sepictic> owned --PM:<Tr3v0r> you fkin ass. --PM:<Tr3v0r> get e unbanned. --PM:<Tr3v0r> me* --PM:<Tr3v0r> TBH, It was my fault. That was a pretty good hoax. --PM:<Tr3v0r> Now get me unbanned. PM--:<Sepictic> I can't, don't have rights --PM:<Tr3v0r> Wow. And I though I wasn't a noob. :([/code]

item.title: A study of the #mopar IRC badwords filter
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:15, topic:139082”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=191056.msg1722995#msg1722995 date=1188693390]
Can moparisthebest post in this thread so we can come to some sort of agreement with him, because nobody likes the new censor, people are getting kicked every minute because of accidentally using caps. I don’t know one person who thinks the new censor is good lol.

Reconsider please mopar?
[/quote]
We have moved to aftermaths IRC server, its hosted off his computer so it most likely won’t last long because his ISP will most likely rape him for running it.

So lets find a network WHERE WE CAN USE CAPS LOCK AND SAY EPIC AND FALE!!1!!1111![/quote]
i know im on that irc server now, i was just asking to see mitb post with his opinion

Read full topic
item.source: A study of the #mopar IRC badwords filter

I don’t know one person who thinks the new censor is good lol.

Reconsider please mopar?[/quote]
We have moved to aftermaths IRC server, its hosted off his computer so it most likely won’t last long because his ISP will most likely rape him for running it.

So lets find a network WHERE WE CAN USE CAPS LOCK AND SAY EPIC AND FALE!!1!!1111!

item.title: A study of the #mopar IRC badwords filter
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“Aftermath, post:7, topic:139082”]We managed to get down to 20 users.

Nobody should be unbanned, we should do a Survivor-style game to see who’s the last one left in the channel.[/quote]
hahah, or when mopar comes in we all change our nicks to something like you’re then ask mopar questions because he has the tendacy to say you’re nick when answering you’re questions so if he does enough and he is banned then maybe he will remove it?

Read full topic

item.title: A study of the #mopar IRC badwords filter
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:3, topic:139082”]They block Fap.

And all CAPS.

ALL CAPS CAN BE A EXPRESSION OF ANGER.

/fail[/quote]
i agree i’ve been kicked at least 10 times now for using all caps. I never realised how much i use caps… and it’s not to be annoying and spam its only to express betterly(word?) how i would be saying it if i were standing in a real room with loads of other horny nerds.

The chat filter is just weird… :S

Read full topic

item.title: A study of the #mopar IRC badwords filter
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

Just an IRC log.

[code]* Tr3v0r has joined #mopar
Tr3v0r
Tr3v0r
Tr3v0r
wut.
say my name
wanna test something
sepictic

  • Tr3v0r was kicked by Nintendo (Watch your language!)
  • Tr3v0r has joined #mopar
    owtf
    it didn’t work, try again
    it kicked me
    it might be your client
    sepictic
  • Tr3v0r was kicked by Nintendo (Watch your language!)
  • Tr3v0r has joined #mopar
    hmm, that’s odd
    i think i fixed it, say my name again
    erm.
    last time.
    one last time
    ok
    sepictic
  • Nintendo sets mode: +b !@daIRC-DA9F5549.tampfl.fios.verizon.net
  • Tr3v0r was kicked by Nintendo (Watch your language!)
    and the kick… and it’s good!
    owned
    –PM: you fkin ass.
    –PM: get e unbanned.
    –PM: me*
    –PM: TBH, It was my fault. That was a pretty good hoax.
    –PM: Now get me unbanned.
    PM–: I can’t, don’t have rights
    –PM: Wow. And I though I wasn’t a noob. :([/code]

Read full topic
